app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Video Editor and Maker
app_description: Video Editor app for iPhone and iPad simplifies the entire process of adding music to your videos. Grab videos directly from your camera or gallery and cut out unwanted moments using the video trimmer feature. You can add tracks to any videos by recording the audio yourself or choosing songs from iTunes Music. Key Features of Video Editor: Trim videos in just a few steps 3 ways to add music to videos: in app tracks iTunes Music and by recording your own audios Trim audio tracks as necessary after adding Adjust volume loop audio use fade in and fade out option Share on social media platforms like Instagram Facebook etc. No watermark Terms of Use: https: www.twinbit.net tc addmusic terms.php Privacy Policy: https: www.twinbit.net tc addmusic privacy.php Disclaimer: This app is free to download but you will be required to make a one time purchase to access the app s full functionality.
